> Does someone could close this issue? It's fix in #6257

I will close this issue.
LGTM.

Airflow version 1.10 introduces Kubernetes Executor and Kubernetes Operator, allowing new Pods to be created for each task to process, and the newly created Pod will be cleaned up after execution, and each task can be specified with a different Docker image for processing
Airflow 1.10 版本引入了 Kubernetes Executor 和 Kubernetes Operator 允许为每一个任务创建新的 Pod 来处理，而执行完之后新创建的 Pod 会被清理掉，并且每一个任务都可以指定不同的 Docker image 来处理

Should DolphinScheduler also support this way to perform tasks?
DolphinScheduler 是否应该也支持这种方式来执行任务?

@chengshiwen  Thankyou
